name: Breach (itch) (SlickRightClick)
description:
A text adventure where the player assumes the role of a D-class personnel within the established SCP universe (Secure. Contain. Protect) during a facility wide breach.

The player must choose the right path to avoid deadly and horrific creatures at every turn, while manoeuvring the facility to either escape or get to a safe room.

This is the first game I  have made in Unity. 
I decided to create this project as I am partaking in an online course in learning C# and Unity, and creating a text adventure was the first real exercise in picking up the basics.
